explanation: [0-0] The video is presented in a picture-in-picture format. The main screen shows a man with headphones sitting behind a drum set against a black background, with a purple cloth laid underneath the drumhead. He is wearing a burgundy T-shirt and dark pants, holding two ring-shaped drumsticks in both hands. The drumstick in his right hand has colorful ribbons hanging from the end. He is looking at the lower right corner and smiling. A small screen to the right of the man's head shows a metal container placed in a bowl of glue-like substance, which is placed on a silver-gray container.

[0-10] In the small screen, the metal stick starts to stir slowly in the bowl, and the man follows by rubbing the two drumsticks together. As the stirring speed increases in the small screen, the man's rubbing speed also accelerates. Subsequently, the small screen shows the glue-like substance being taken out of the bowl and thrown onto a grayish-white background, and the man follows by flipping his right drumstick and swinging it downwards. In the small screen, a gloved hand picks up a silver metal lid and presses it down on the glue-like substance, flattening it and thinning it out, which the man watches in amazement. Then the hand takes a doll-shaped mold and presses it onto the glue-like substance, followed by the hand taking the silver metal lid and placing it on top of the glue-like substance, at which point the man strikes the drumstick once. The hand removes the doll-shaped mold, revealing the doll model left on the glue-like substance. Subsequently, a five-pointed star and an umbrella model are pressed onto this glue-like substance. During this process, the man watches curiously, his two hands moving along with the actions displayed on the small screen.

[10-15] Finally, the picture in the small screen switches to a man in blue clothes holding a yellow piece of glue-like substance with an umbrella shape in both hands, staring at it. He then pulls the "umbrella" out from the glue-like substance, and the man in the main screen looks at the "umbrella" in surprise. The man in the main screen smiles and picks up a lump of yellow glue-like substance placed on the side of the drum with his left hand, kneading it from time to time, and finally looks at the camera with a smile.
